name: SquareDash (beta)
description:
This is an early access game and is not finished. It will get updates.

SquareDash is a 2D precision platformer in which the player controls a square that has an 8 direction dash. The player must navigate through tight jumps, precise dashes, and get to the win block! The game can be played with a controller, but the menus still have to be navigated with a mouse.

This is my first ever published game!
